channel.title: Timeline of the City's History: 1876 on Homicide in Chicago 1870-1930
channel.description: Recent content in Timeline of the City's History: 1876 on Homicide in Chicago 1870-1930

item.title: At Drexel Boulevard Where It Connects with Oakwood Boulevard
item.description: The old phaeton house called ‘The Cottage’ where one could hire a phaeton and for twenty-five cents have a beautiful drive through Washington Park. Courtesy of “Chicago and Its Makers” (Chicago: Felix Mendelsohn, 1929). Other images from this year
